training_methodology.notes: prompts/plan-generation/methodology.md — GROUND TRUTH. Periodization rules, exercise selection philosophy. Created in Session 1 (2026-02-08).

plan_system_prompt.notes: prompts/plan-generation/system-prompt.md + exercise-selection.md + injury-protocols.md. Created in Session 1 (2026-02-08).

plan_output_schema.notes: prompts/plan-generation/output-schema.json. UPGRADED to v3.1 (2026-03-01): 6-block A-F structure, validation_checks, warm_ups, deload_protocol, readiness_assessment, weekly_progression, substitutions per exercise.

plan_constraint_files.notes: v3.1 addition (2026-03-01). 5 new files: block-taxonomy.md, plan-generation-constraints.md, exercise-bank-schema.json, progression-rules.json. Provides structured data and hard validation rules for AI plan generation.

plan_few_shot_examples.notes: prompts/plan-generation/examples/. 3-5 complete plan examples for diverse user profiles.

coach_personality.notes: prompts/coach-chat/personality.md — GROUND TRUTH for coach voice.

test_personas.notes: tests/personas/. 3 personas created (2026-02-08): beginner-knee-injury-home-gym, advanced-martial-artist-full-gym, senior-multiple-injuries-minimal-equip. Target: 20+.

plan_validation_tests.notes: tests/plan-validation.ts. Automated safety checks on generated plans.

coach_behavior_tests.notes: tests/coach-behavior.ts. Coach stays in character, within boundaries.

output_schema_v3_1.name: plan-generation-output-schema.json
output_schema_v3_1.breaking_changes: Blocks expanded from A-D to A-F. validation_checks object added to plan_metadata. warm_ups, deload_protocol, readiness_assessment now required top-level fields. Backend generate-plan Edge Function must be updated to match.
output_schema_v3_1.notes: Backend Agent: the existing generate-plan function parses against the old 4-block schema. Must update to handle 6 blocks (E: Hypertrophy, F: Accessory) and new top-level fields.

blockers.blocker: Backend generate-plan Edge Function still uses old 4-block output schema. Must be updated to parse v3.1 schema with 6 blocks + validation_checks.
